topic.title: What is the best way to remove bad contents?
topic.body: For example if we find a bad "avatar.jpg" into the ZeroMe-GreenHub, can we remove it manually from the filesystem to avoid to share it? or do we have to use the WebSocket API ?

1_1546FEZjAaS8Soy8Pzc6weXgbFTVAv84Vi.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_157_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): There are frequently people chatting in ZeroMedia.

What is ZeroMedia? :O

3_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS.body: Using trackers (see into the source code)
